nodes.text: Shiana Trist was a female Human bounty hunter who operated during the Clone Wars.

Trist co-operated with the bounty hunters Drokka and K1-1R, to try and collect Contract AA23, a bounty that had been placed on the Heroes of Cularin. They attacked the heroes on Nar Shaddaa, but failed and Trist was able to escape.

She later flew her Z-95 Headhunter to the Cularin system, to try and capture the Liana Liberators. She put aside her previous grievances with the Heroes of Cularin and they helped her attack the Liberators.
